level.heading: PARTIAL CERTIFICATE OF OCCUPANCY FEE (ยง 14-1412)

level.text: The nonrefundable application fee for partial Certificates of Occupancy filed in accordance with the D.C. Building Code shall be twenty dollars ($20), plus an hourly fee to be determined at a rate of thirteen dollars ($13) per inspector hour charged by full hour or fraction thereof.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice Final Rulemaking published at 29 DCR 5571, 5576 (December 17, 1982).
